Class PlayersFXMLController

  • java.lang.Object
    • final_oop.PlayersFXMLController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class PlayersFXMLController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This is the controller class for the FXML file and GUI screen for all the players. that implements Initializable

        public void RollDice(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Method to roll dice and assign the images to the dice faces ion the player User Interface.
        Parameters:
        event - The event is the clicking he Roll Dice button action taken by user in the UI.

      • analyzeuserrolls

        public void analyzeuserrolls(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is especially for user player that takes dices rolled by the user player and send it to another method of different class to analyze it.
        Parameters:
        event - This is the event taken by user player i.e. clicking "CLICK ME if you are happy with your roll" button in the UI.

      • Startthegame

        public void Startthegame(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method enables the no of buttons on the UI based on the no of players and disable the rest. It also reveals all the assigned character's name and revels who is sheriff.
        Parameters:
        event - The event is clicking the "!!!! BEFORE BEGINNIG THE GAME, CLICK THIS BUTTON !!!!" button in UI.

      • PLayer1

        public void PLayer1(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This method handles loads the FXML for the User player when its his/her turn.
        Parameters:
        event - The Event is when player click on it character name button.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - To handle the IOException incase exists.

      • PLayer2

        public void PLayer2(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
             throws java.io.IOException
        This method handles and loads the FXML for the other player when its his/her turn.
        Parameters:
        event - The event is when they click on the respective characters name.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
